products.name: GUESS CONNECT WATCH
products.desc: Time and date displayed on the screen. Current time is in large numbers, date is in small numbers above it. Light: Pressing the light button on the side of the watch activates a light while the button is pressed. Pressing and holding that button for 3 seconds turns on the light and keeps it on, until the button is held again for 3 seconds or up to 2 hours. After 2 hours, it will automatically turn off.
